ios_app_store.subtitle: Your Autopilot for Daily Decisions
ios_app_store.description:
Stop deciding what to have for breakfast, what to wear, or which route to take. MindFlow Auto learns your preferences and automates routine decisions so you can focus on what matters.

• Morning routines that adapt to your schedule
• Smart choice elimination for daily decisions
• Evening reflection that improves automation
• Reduces decision fatigue and mental load

Free tier provides basic automation. Premium unlocks advanced AI, family features, and unlimited profiles.

android_play_store.short_description: AI autopilot for daily decisions. Reduces choice overload and decision fatigue.
android_play_store.full_description:
Tired of decision fatigue from choosing what to wear, eat, or do every morning? MindFlow Auto learns your preferences and automates routine decisions, getting smarter over time.

KEY FEATURES:
• AI-powered morning routine generation
• Smart choice elimination for daily decisions
• Evening reflection for continuous improvement
• Decision pattern tracking and insights
• Offline functionality with cloud sync

WORKS FOR YOU:
• Busy professionals with packed schedules
• Anyone experiencing choice overload
• People seeking more mental clarity
• Families coordinating household decisions

FREE FEATURES:
• Basic automation and decision tracking
• Simple preference learning
• Local data storage

PREMIUM FEATURES:
• Advanced AI decision models
• Family coordination and sharing
• Unlimited decision profiles
• Cross-device sync and integrations

Start your free trial today and experience the calm of automated decisions.

screenshots_plan.visual_focus: Family member management and shared automation

long_tail_keywords: app that makes decisions for me
keyword_strategy.competitor_analysis: Target keywords where Todoist/Notion rank high but don't address decision automation specifically
keyword_strategy.keyword_difficulty_assessment: Medium difficulty for productivity terms, low difficulty for decision automation niche

audience_building: Productivity newsletter partnerships and guest content
ADHD community engagement around decision fatigue topics
Beta tester community building through ProductHunt
content_preparation: Blog series on decision fatigue research
Social proof collection from beta users
Press kit with unique automation angle
pre_launch.press_outreach: Productivity and wellness publications focusing on unique decision automation approach
pre_launch.beta_testing_program: 200 beta users recruited from productivity communities, ADHD support groups, busy professional networks

launch_day.announcement_strategy: Soft launch with ProductHunt submission, followed by press release focusing on decision automation innovation
launch_day.social_media_campaign: LinkedIn and Twitter content targeting productivity pain points, decision fatigue awareness
launch_day.community_engagement: Reddit r/productivity, r/ADHD engagement, HackerNews discussion participation

post_launch.user_onboarding_optimization: A/B testing onboarding flows, personalized automation suggestions, improved trial conversion
post_launch.feedback_collection: In-app feedback system, user interview program, satisfaction surveys
post_launch.iteration_planning: Weekly feature releases based on user feedback, monthly major updates

engagement_metrics.day_1_retention: 75% (high for productivity apps due to immediate automation value)
engagement_metrics.day_30_retention: 65% (above productivity app average due to AI learning)
engagement_metrics.session_length: 3-5 minutes (brief by design to reduce cognitive load)

monetization_targets.trial_conversion_rate: 18% (above 12% benchmark due to unique automation value)

store_performance.app_store_rating: 4.6+ stars (targeting high satisfaction from decision reduction)

potential_risks.risk: AI automation fails to learn user preferences effectively
potential_risks.mitigation_strategy: Robust fallback to manual preference setting, continuous algorithm improvement, user feedback integration

potential_risks.risk: Users feel loss of control with automation
potential_risks.mitigation_strategy: Preview-and-approve patterns, easy automation modification, clear manual override options
Strong onboarding showing value, progressive feature unlocking, clear premium benefits demonstration

contingency_plans.response_plan: Accelerate onboarding improvements, increase automation value demonstration, reduce friction
contingency_plans.decision_criteria: <60% day-7 retention triggers immediate UX audit

contingency_plans.response_plan: Address compliance issues immediately, leverage RevenueCat expertise for subscription compliance
contingency_plans.decision_criteria: Any rejection triggers expedited compliance review and resubmission within 72 hours

immediate_updates.rationale: Smart home integration for premium users based on initial feedback and market demand
Enhanced automation algorithms based on real usage data and pattern recognition

feature_pipeline.user_value: Household decision automation for families, increasing subscription value and reducing churn
Automated home environment adjustments based on routine and preferences
Energy-aware automation considering sleep, exercise, and health patterns

platform_expansion.localization_plan: Spanish and French localization by Q2 2027 based on user demand
